short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flappy Bird for Chrome is a classic arcade game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Play more games on the top-left menu.

"Flappy Bird for Chrome" is a delightful and nostalgic Chrome extension that brings the classic Flappy Bird game directly to your browser. Immerse yourself in this addictive and challenging gaming experience without the need for additional downloads or installations. Simply install the extension, and you'll have the iconic Flappy Bird game at your fingertips whenever you open a new tab in Chrome.

Navigate the cute, flapping bird through a series of pipes, testing your reflexes and aiming for the highest score possible. With a simple one-button control scheme, the game is easy to pick up, but mastering it requires precision and timing. The extension provides a quick and entertaining way to take a break from your daily tasks, offering a dose of fun and nostalgia.

Enjoy the familiar graphics, sounds, and gameplay that made Flappy Bird a sensation, now conveniently accessible within your Chrome browser. "Flappy Bird for Chrome" is the perfect way to relive the excitement of this legendary game and challenge yourself to beat your previous high score. Whether you're a fan of the original Flappy Bird or discovering it for the first time, this Chrome extension brings the joy of flapping through pipes directly to your online browsing experience.
